quote.content: Success is not final; failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.  Perseverance goes a long way
quote.author: Winston S. Churchill

quote.content: The first step toward success is taken when you refuse to be a captive of the environment in which you first find yourself. Don’t let your circumstances hold you back
quote.author: Mark Caine

quote.content: It’s not whether you get knocked down, it’s whether you get up. Obstacles are inevitable, but quitting isn’t
quote.author: Vince Lombardi

quote.content: The question isn’t who is going to let me, it’s who is going to stop me. You don’t need to wait for permission to succeed
quote.author: Ayn Rand

quote.content: It is better to fail in originality than to succeed in imitation. Sometimes, success means being the first to fail
quote.author: Herman Melville

quote.content: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day-in and day-out. It’s all about daily, consistent action
quote.author: Robert Collier

quote.content: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great. Sometimes, you have to make sacrifices to succeed
quote.author: John D. Rockefeller

quote.content: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have. Isn’t it funny how that works?
quote.author: Thomas Jefferson

quote.content: Whether you think you can or think you can’t, you’re right. Your mindset is everything
quote.author: Henry Ford

quote.content: There are two types of people who will tell you that you cannot make a difference in this world: those who are afraid to try and those who are afraid you will succeed. Only listen to those who are already where you want to be
quote.author: Ray Goforth

quote.content: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream. There’s no deadline for success
quote.author: C.S. Lewis

quote.content: Success is focusing the full power of all you are on what you have a burning desire to achieve. You’ve got to give it your all
quote.author: Wilfred Peterson

quote.content: Try not to become a person of success, but rather try to become a person of value. They’re not always the same thing
quote.author: Albert Einstein

quote.content: Successful people do what unsuccessful people are not willing to do. Don't wish it were easier; wish you were better. Because it was easy, everyone would do it
quote.author: Jim Rohn

quote.content: The road to success is always under construction.  It’s rarely a smooth journey
quote.author: Lily Tomlin

quote.content: Patience, persistence and perspiration make an unbeatable combination for success. Patience, persistence and perspiration make an unbeatable combination for success.
quote.author: Napoleon Hill

quote.content: Don't be distracted by criticism. Remember, the only taste of success some people get is to take a bite out of you. Tune out the naysayers
quote.author: Zig Ziglar

quote.content: Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough. Don’t let it keep you down for long
quote.author: Og Mandino

quote.content: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it. A great reminder to not get too caught up in the pursuit of success
quote.author: Henry David Thoreau

quote.content: You don’t have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great. The perfect time to begin is now
quote.author: Zig Ziglar

quote.content: Success does not consist in never making mistakes but in never making the same one a second time. It’s all about the learning process
quote.author: George Bernard Shaw

quote.content: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary. You’ve got to put in the hard yards
quote.author: Vidal Sassoon

quote.content: Today’s accomplishments were yesterday’s impossibilities. Because it always seems impossible until it’s done
quote.author: Robert H. Schuller

quote.content: Success is how high you bounce when you hit bottom. Resilience is the key
quote.author: George S. Patton

quote.content: For every reason it’s not possible, there are hundreds of people who have faced the same circumstances and succeeded. Look for evidence why you can do it, not for why you shouldn’t
quote.author: Jack Canfield

quote.content: Ever tried. Ever failed. No matter. Try Again. Fail again. Fail better.  A simple yet effective mantra for success
quote.author: Samuel Beckett

quote.content: You know you are on the road to success if you would do your job, and not be paid for it. A great sign you’re on the right track
quote.author: Oprah Winfrey

quote.content: There is a powerful driving force inside every human being that, once unleashed, can make any vision, dream, or desire a reality. Because e all have limitless potential for success
quote.author: Anthony Robbins

quote.content: The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus. That goes for women too!
quote.author: Bruce Lee

quote.content: Do today what others won't and achieve tomorrow what others can't. Extraordinary results call for extraordinary effort
quote.author: Jerry Rice

quote.content: The distance between insanity and genius is measured only by success. They’re not so different after all!
quote.author: Bruce Feirstein

quote.content: I never dreamed about success, I worked for it. There’s no substitute for taking action
quote.author: Estee Lauder

quote.content: I attribute my success to this: I never gave or took any excuse. Be bigger than your excuses
quote.author: Florence Nightingale

quote.content: Don't let the fear of losing be greater than the excitement of winning. Feel the fear, and do it anyway
quote.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quote.content: The secret of success is to do the common thing uncommonly well. Whatever you are, be a good one
quote.author: John D. Rockefeller Jr.

quote.content: You don’t have to see the whole staircase, just take the first step. It’s okay not to have it all figured out
quote.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote.content: The difference between a successful person and others is not a lack of knowledge, but a lack of will. Willpower will get you everywhere
quote.author: Vince Lombardi Jr.

quote.content: There’s no elevator to success. You have to take the stairs. It’s not always easy, but it’s worth it
quote.author: Zig Ziglar

quote.content: Success is not the absence of failure, it’s persistence through failure. You just have to keep going
quote.author: Aisha Tyler

quote.content: Success is the good fortune that comes from aspiration, desperation, perspiration and inspiration. It takes far more than just luck
quote.author: Evan Esar

quote.content: Great achievement is usually born of great sacrifice, and is never the result of selfishness. Sometimes in order to get, you need to first give
quote.author: Napoleon Hill

quote.content: For success, attitude is equally as important as ability. Don’t underestimate its power
quote.author: Harry F. Banks

quote.content: To succeed in life, you need two things: ignorance and confidence. What you don’t know can be just as valuable as what you do
quote.author: Mark Twain

quote.content: Things may come to those who wait, but only the things left by those who hustle. The early bird gets the worm
quote.author: Abraham Lincoln

quote.content: The master has failed more times than the beginner has even tried. Don’t be afraid to try and fail
quote.author: Stephen McCranie

quote.content: Every accomplishment starts with a decision to try. Getting started is the most important part
quote.author: John F. Kennedy

quote.content: Positive action combined with positive thinking results in success. You can’t have one without the other
quote.author: Shiv Khera

quote.content: If it doesn’t scare you, you’re probably not dreaming big enough. A great reminder to set lofty goals
quote.author: Tory Burch

quote.content: I have not failed. I’ve just found 10,000 ways that won’t work. Each ‘failure’  can get you one step closer to success
quote.author: Thomas Edison

quote.content: Success is where preparation and opportunity meet. Be prepared to take good luck when it comes
quote.author: Bobby Unser

quote.content: Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up. So, never give up
quote.author: Thomas Edison

quote.content: Success isn't always about greatness. It's about consistency. Consistent hard work leads to success. Greatness will come. Consistency is the key
quote.author: Dwayne Johnson

quote.content: Successful people are not gifted; they just work hard, then succeed on purpose.
quote.author: G.K. Nielson

quote.content: Character cannot be developed in ease and quiet. Only through experience of trial and suffering can the soul be strengthened, vision cleared, ambition inspired and success achieved.
quote.author: Helen Keller

quote.content: Success is no accident. It is hard work, perseverance, learning, studying, sacrifice and most of all, love of what you are doing or learning to do.
quote.author: Pele
